item.description:
On Monday, Columbus Day, let’s meet and socialize while enjoying great LIVE MUSIC, FINE ART, UNIQUE CRAFTS, and DELICIOUS FOOD from Newburyport's best restaurants!

The LIVE MUSIC will start at 1:00 and continue until 4pm!

This is the CLASSIC ROCK BAND called; “97 NORTH”.

Newburyport is just about a ½ hour drive from Portsmouth and the weather’s looking pretty fine for this 2012 Columbus Day. So if you have the day off or can come for even a short time, please do. It'll be a fun time with some great folks!

This is an open event and the festivities start at 10:00am. But as your new organizer I’d like to meet you. So between 12:00 - 12:30pm I’ll be just in front of the Firehouse Center for the Arts wearing my cap with a MEETUP pin on the back. Whatever time you come you can reach me @ (603) 204-1657 and we can meetup.

Hope to see you there!

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Newburyport’s Fall Harvest Festival!
